name: Peng Last Stand
description:
PENG: LAST STAND

Save as many penguins as you can before the clock runs out. Oh, and don't fall off the ice.

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. ) Move main penguin (Peng) around using arrow keys
  2. ) Move Peng near little penguins; little penguins automatically follow after contact
  3. ) The ice platform shrinks consistently; be careful to not fall off
  4. ) Drop little penguins off at the igloo by walking over it before time runs out
  5. ) Gather as many little penguins as possible, good luck!

CONTRIBUTORS

👾 Daniel Quintana - Programmer (Unity), Game Design, Coding

🤖 Josiah Kinney - Programmer (Unity), Animation

🎨 Kelli Vu - UX Research, UI Design, Character Design, Logo, Background Design

❄️ Len Huynh - Icon Design, Final Video and Animation, Sound Effects

🎲 Olivia Cheng - UX/UI Design, Story, Character Design, Animation, Project Manager

This was our first time working together as a remote team. We had a blast making this for Design Buddies first game jam! Thanks for playing!
